text: @GovMurphy Sir, prepare the second  wave of coronavirus.  Because  people in jersey  don't believe  in  wearing  a mask. In the public transit system, restaurants  employees,  policemen,  Firefighters, mayor of small towns.  Everyone  think this is a joke. Good luck on your opening  day
